sentences.en: A safe stronghold our God is still . A trusty shield and weapon.
sentences.cn: 上帝是我们的安全要塞,是庇护我们的剑与盾.

sentences.en: At dawn, we stormed the enemy's stronghold.
sentences.cn: 拂晓时, 我们猛攻了敌人的堡垒.

sentences.en: Before long the whole proud stronghold of science began to shake to its foundations.
sentences.cn: 时隔不久,令人自豪的整座科学殿堂便开始从它的根基动摇起来.

sentences.en: Complete with crenellations, ramparts and parapets , the stronghold of nescience reigns supreme.
sentences.cn: 开垛口 、 城墙 、 胸墙具备的无知的要塞极度盛行.

sentences.en: God , in her palaces , Has made Himself known as a stronghold.
sentences.cn: 诗48:3神在其宫中自显为避难所.

sentences.en: He is my shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
sentences.cn: 他是我的盾牌,是拯救我的角, 是我的高台.

sentences.en: Heroes visiting the Hall of Valhalla in a Stronghold become better warriors.
sentences.cn: 在据点城里访问了英烈祠的英雄将变成更好的武士.

sentences.en: It is the spy seated in the central stronghold of the ego.
sentences.cn: 它是安插在自我的中心堡垒中的暗探.

sentences.en: Our army completely surrounded and corked up the enemy stronghold.
sentences.cn: 我军把敌人的堡垒完全包围并封锁起来.

sentences.en: Out soldiers levelled the enemy stronghold with the ground.
sentences.cn: 我们的士兵把敌人的堡垒夷为平地.

sentences.en: Shetland is the last stronghold of otters in the British Isles.
sentences.cn: 设得兰群岛是水獭在不列颠群岛上最后的栖息地。

sentences.en: The area is a Republican stronghold.
sentences.cn: 这个地区是共和党的大本营。

sentences.en: The fighters moved south to their mountain stronghold.
sentences.cn: 战士们向南行进，到达他们在山上的据点。

sentences.en: The magazine has long stronghold of investigative reporting in China.
sentences.cn: 《财经》杂志长期以来一直以调查性报告闻名.

sentences.en: The western-most part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers.
sentences.cn: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

sentences.en: They decided to come upon the enemy stronghold by night.
sentences.cn: 他们决定夜间进攻敌人的据点.

sentences.en: We immediately barraged the enemy stronghold with a torrent of rifle fire.
sentences.cn: 我们立刻用密集的步枪火力攻击敌人据点.

trans.tran_en: an area that is strongly defended by a military group
